messages: You have a strange dream about crabs.
Your dreams give you a strange shelled feeling.
You dream of walking on a sandy beach.
For some reason you dream of your gloves.  They don't fit, and nothing seems to help...
You have a disturbing dream of walking sideways all the time.
Your vivid dream of living as a crab frightens you.
You dream of pinching zombies with your claws.
You have a vivid dream of shedding your carapace. It feels good.
You have a strange dream about snakes.
Your dreams give you a strange slithery feeling.
You have a weird dream of slithering on the ground.
In your dream, you see a strangely serpentine image of yourself.
You have a terrifying dream of losing your legs.
You dream of silently moving in shadows.
You have a pleasant dream of coiling around your prey.
You have a scary dream of running out of venom.
You have a strange dream about rabbits.
Your dreams give you a strange twitchy feeling.
You dream of walking on a grassy meadow.
In your dream, you look in the mirror and see a rabbit.
You have a weird dream of carelessly jumping around.
You have a terrifying dream of being chased by a fox.
You have a blissful dream of eating carrots all day.
You have a pleasant dream of having your ears fondled and massaged.
